Thanks for signing up! Before getting st: Thanks for signing up! Before getting started, could you verify your email address by clicking on the link we just emailed to you? If you didn't receive the email, we will gladly send you another.
A new verification link has been sent to: A new verification link has been sent to the email address you provided during registration.
Once your account is deleted, all of its: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Before deleting your account, please download any data or information that you wish to retain.
Are you sure you want to delete your acc: Are you sure you want to delete your account? Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Please enter your password to confirm you would like to permanently delete your account.
Manage and log out your active sessions: Manage and log out your active sessions on other browsers and devices.
If necessary, you may log out of all of: If necessary, you may log out of all of your other browser sessions across all of your devices. When two factor authentication is enable: When two factor authentication is enabled, you will be prompted for a secure, random token during authentication. You may retrieve this token from your phone's Google Authenticator application.
Two factor authentication is now enabled: Two factor authentication is now enabled. Scan the following QR code using your phone's authenticator application.
Store these recovery codes in a secure p: Store these recovery codes in a secure password manager. They can be used to recover access to your account if your two factor authentication device is lost.
Ensure your account is using a long, ran: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure.
Update your account's profile informatio: Update your account's profile information and email address.

Teamstructor provides team management, t: Teamstructor provides team management, team projects, project discussion & project resources.
To switch teams you can use the dropdown: To switch teams you can use the dropdown in upper right corner.
Inside each team you can find projects t: Inside each team you can find projects that you and other team members created.
Inside each project you can discuss rele: Inside each project you can discuss relevant topics and project updates with other team members and browse uploaded project resources.
Check team settings and team members.
Explore your projects. Engage in project: Explore your projects. Engage in project discussion by posting or commenting or browse shared project resources.
Welcome to your Teamstructor admin dashb: Welcome to your Teamstructor admin dashboard!
Teamstructor admin dashboard enables you: Teamstructor admin dashboard enables you to manage application users, teams, projects and resources.
Application users are displayed below. Y: Application users are displayed below. You can check each user personal information (such as name and email), their teams and whether they have administrator privileges.
Search users by name or email...
Teams created by your application users: Teams created by your application users are displayed below. You can check details for each team - name, team owner, team members, whether it is a personal team, time of creation and projects that belong to the team.
Projects created inside existing teams a: Projects created inside existing teams are displayed below. You can check details for each project - name, description, project creator, creation date, team it belongs to. You can also check project discussion and uploaded resources.
